name: West Cary Group
tagline: Advertising Agency, Digital Marketing in Richmond
description: WCG is a full-service, minority-owned small business and award-winning marketing communications and advertising agency headquartered in Richmond, VA. We specialize in performance-based marketing and pride ourselves on measuring our contribution to business results. Our capabilities include digital advertising and media buying, mobile application design and development, web design and development, brand marketing and advertising, direct response marketing and employee communications.
